product_name: New Balance WO80 Minimus Multisport Shoes - Women's
long_description: Whether you can run barefoot for miles or love the structure of a full shoe, the New Balance WO80 Minimalist Multisport shoes offer protection while letting you reap the benefits of minimalist shoes. Built around the New Balance Minimus last, WO80 shoes feature a 4mm heel-to-toe drop for a good balance between trail-ready and minimalist performance. Lightweight, abrasion-resistant nylon mesh uppers let feet breathe and offer sturdy performance in demanding conditions; synthetic overlays help provide structure and support. Synthetic linings wick perspiration away from your feet and dry quickly to discourage the development of blisters. Lightweight and thin EVA midsoles offer flexibility and featherweight cushioning. Aggressive Vibram(R) rubber outsoles on the New Balance WO80 Minimus multisport shoes feature multidirectional tread for great uphill and downhill traction.
short_description: Whether you can run barefoot for miles or love the structure of a full shoe, the New Balance WO80 Minimalist Multisport shoes offer protection while letting you reap the benefits of minimalist shoes.
